test-results.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-suite.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-case.description: Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified

failure.message: Expected regular expression 'Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts' to match '[2025-06-19 20:07:53.266] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized', but it did not match.
failure.stack-trace: at $result.Output | Should -Match "Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts", /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/tests/unit/modules/CoreApp/NonInteractiveMode.Tests.ps1:123 at <ScriptBlock>, /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/tests/unit/modules/CoreApp/NonInteractiveMode.Tests.ps1:123

test-case.description: Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode

failure.message: Expected the actual value to be less than 12, but got 12.

test-case.description: Should handle missing configuration files gracefully
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should handle missing configuration files gracefully

test-case.description: Should execute all scripts in WhatIf mode without errors
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Auto Mode Non-Interactive.Should execute all scripts in WhatIf mode without errors

failure.message: Expected regular expression 'Running all scripts in automatic mode' to match 'What if: Performing the operation "Add Content" on target "Path: /tmp/opentofu-lab-automation.log".', but it did not match.

failure.message: Expected regular expression 'Running all scripts in automatic mode' to match 'What if: Performing the operation "Add Content" on target "Path: /tmp/opentofu-lab-automation.log".', but it did not match.

failure.message: Expected regular expression 'Executing script: 0200_Get-SystemInfo' to match 'What if: Performing the operation "Add Content" on target "Path: /tmp/opentofu-lab-automation.log".', but it did not match.

failure.message: Expected regular expression 'Executing script: 0200_Get-SystemInfo' to match 'What if: Performing the operation "Add Content" on target "Path: /tmp/opentofu-lab-automation.log".', but it did not match.

test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Specific Script Execution.Should handle nonexistent script gracefully
